text: Ennaiyum, en tutaraiyum (atavatu um'maiyum) nampikkai kollumpati (appostalarkal ennum umatu) cisyarkalukku nan vahyin mulam terivitta camayattil, avarkal (avvare) nankal nampinom; niccayamaka nankal (iraivanukku murrilum kilppatinta) muslimkal enpatarku nir catciyaka irukkavum! Enru kuriyataiyum ninaittup parppiraka (enrum annalil kuruvan)
